m_szDocTitle: Renewable Energy Costs Beat Fossil Fuel Costs
m_szDocSumamry: By Robbie Orvis , Michael O’Boyle , and Hallie Kennan of Energy Innovation America’s electric system is at a stark inflection point: coal power plants are operating at all-time lows with growing retirements , natural gas prices are at historical lows while power generation is rising , electricity sales are flattening , extreme weather events are forcing more resilient infrastructure, and plunging renewable energy prices have made low- or zero-carbon sources cost-competitive with conventional fuel sources.
